Articles.Content:
Have I mentioned how irritating it is to not be able to put Trim on my Flight Stick's hat switch... like every other game that ever was?

Consider it mentioned. Please fix it! The controls need a massive overhaul in general. Why are things so unconfigurable? I know it takes time and effort and I understand priorities, but I would think controls with a flight stick for a flight sim would be important, even if it is a space flight sim.

Please Squad, take some time and look at this again. There should be very few controls that can't be configured and none of them involving flight control.

All keys should be rebindable, full stop. Just for accessibility if nothing else, some people use keyboards with different layouts or alternative input devices; that is laying aside the convenience and customizability factors.

Ideally yes, but at the very least all flight controls should be. There should be an option to select the Mod key even, and then for any given control a checkbox* called "Require Mod Key". So I could leave Mod as Alt and change throttle to Alt+Shift for example.

*Or check...circle, whatever Unity uses for checkboxes.

But I agree it would be nice to have all keys used in all scenes selectable.
